messages.title: Thank you
messages.content: Thanks to you, and millions of others like you, the Liberal Democrats are winning again.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The General Election on 12th December is a huge opportunity to get many more Liberal Democrat MPs in Parliament, fighting for the liberal, progressive values that our party is built on.

issues.brexitEurope: Liberal Democrats are more vital than ever when other parties have moved to the extremes, and when our country stands on the edge of a Brexit disaster.

politicalExperience.role: Deputy Leader of the Liberal Democrats

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS: Please display this poster in your window as a diamond. If you or your friends would like more, you can order them online here: www.libdems.org.uk/poster.
